userinterface.util

Class PresentationMetalTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalTheme
      • javax.swing.plaf.metal.DefaultMetalTheme
        • userinterface.util.PresentationMetalTheme

  • public class PresentationMetalTheme
extends javax.swing.plaf.metal.DefaultMetalTheme
    This class overrides DefaultMetalTheme to change the fonts for components and menus to a bigger size suitable for presentations.

      javax.swing.plaf.FontUIResource getControlTextFont()
      Overrides the superclass's getControlTextFont() method to return a larger font.
      javax.swing.plaf.FontUIResource getMenuTextFont()
      Overrides the superclass's getMenuTextFont method by returning a larger font.
